1.name: Iron Armour
1.details: When Steelheart is not in combat, his armour becomes hardened, granting him a shield based on his maximum health.

2.name: Shattering Smash
2.details: Steelheart winds up his hammer then smashes the floor, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) in a cone-shaped area and slowing all enemies hit for a few seconds.

3.name: Heavy Hit
3.details:
Steelheart's next basic attack becomes a powerful slam, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to the target and nearby enemies.

If any of the enemies has been recently hit by Colossal Smash, Heavy Hit will deal more damage and slightly knock them back.

4.name: Obliterate
4.details:
Steelheart charges for a few seconds, once released, he will start spinning and hitting all nearby enemies, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power).

Quick cast of Obliterate will only spin once. The time taken to charge increases the spinning speed, resulting in more damage over time.

5.name: Magnetic Storm
5.details: Steelheart creates a magnetic field that deals magical damage (scaling with magical power), slowing all nearby enemies and preventing them from using any dashes and teleportations.
